title: (x) transfer at Buster Daly s - Alpha Headline {Yves}
content: id be quite happy if someone could help me id this font... [http://www.d5ive.com/Transfer/transfer\_poster02.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525002557/http:/www.d5ive.com/Transfer/transfer_poster02.jpg) ...the font that "transfer" is in...the "A" is throwing me off...many thanks
author: tgp

comments.content: very close..but i think carplates has slight stroke thickness differences, but mostly, the legs are differed... ( [http://www.identifont.com/samples/acme/Carplates.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525002557/http:/www.identifont.com/samples/acme/Carplates.gif))...

thanks very much.   
dang. i really like alpha headline...
